Title: In the Line of Fire
Actors: Clint Eastwood, John Malkovich, Rene Russo, Dylan McDermott
Plot: Secret Service agent Frank Horrigan (Clint Eastwood) couldn't save Kennedy, but he's determined not to let a clever assassin take out this president.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 2 wins & 14 nominations.
Production: Columbia Pictures Corporation, Castle Rock Entertainment
